üé§ *Speaker Announcement: Ram Iyengar*

_"Will Kubernetes Vanish Because of AI?"_

Ram Iyengar, Chief Evangelist at Cloud Foundry Foundation, asks the question every infra team is quietly googling.

AI workloads don't behave like microservices. GPU scheduling, model versioning, inference pipelines ‚Äî K8s wasn't built for this. Or was it?

Find out at CLOUDxAI 2026. March 14, Bengaluru.

<https://cloudconf.ai|üéüÔ∏è Register>

üöÄ *Speaker Announcement: Naresh Waswani*

_"Messaging at Scale: How We Built a Secure, Serverless Notification Platform on AWS"_

"Serverless scales‚Ä¶ until your messaging system doesn't."

Real-world architecture for distributed notification systems. Security patterns for high-scale systems. The stuff that actually breaks at 3 AM.

March 14, Bengaluru. <https://cloudconf.ai|üéüÔ∏è Get your ticket>

‚ö° *Speaker Announcement: Shubham Londhe*

_"Building Durable AI Agents for DevOps"_

"Most AI agent frameworks are built for demos ‚Äî not for chaos."

Shubham Londhe from Temporal Technologies tackles non-deterministic LLM behavior in production. What happens when your agent hallucinates mid-deployment?

Find out March 14. <https://cloudconf.ai|üéüÔ∏è Register>

ü§ñ *Speaker Announcement: Ravi Shankar*

_"Autonomous Cloud Optimization Agent: Self-Optimizing Cloud Infrastructure Using AI Agents"_

AI-driven infrastructure optimization without human intervention. No more manual right-sizing. No more cloud bill surprises (hopefully).

15 years of DevOps experience distilled into one talk. March 14, Bengaluru.

<https://cloudconf.ai|üéüÔ∏è Grab your ticket>

üß† *Speaker Announcement: Savinder Puri*

_"Your Inner Stack > Your Tech Stack: What 100x Cloud Native Engineers Do Differently"_

This isn't a tools talk. This is a mindset talk.

Savinder Puri, Associate VP DevSecOps at Zensar Technologies, on the habits and mental models that separate great engineers from everyone else.

March 14, CLOUDxAI. <https://cloudconf.ai|üéüÔ∏è Register>

üî• *Panel Alert: "Agents in Production: What Actually Works (and What Breaks)"*

Panelists:
‚Ä¢ Kaushik Deb ‚Äî Associate Director, AI Engineering at Piramal Finance
‚Ä¢ Shashank Karpal ‚Äî Director of Business Growth at KodeKloud
‚Ä¢ Pramod Singh ‚Äî Expert Associate Partner, Data Science at Bain & Company

No slides. No fluff. Just real production war stories about AI agents.

March 14, Hall A. <https://cloudconf.ai|üéüÔ∏è Register>

üî• *Panel Alert: "Cloud is starting to think."*

Panelists:
‚Ä¢ Rahul Jadhav ‚Äî Co-founder & CTO at AccuKnox
‚Ä¢ Kunal Kushwaha ‚Äî Senior Developer Advocate at Cast AI
‚Ä¢ Ram Iyengar ‚Äî Chief Evangelist at Cloud Foundry Foundation
‚Ä¢ Arsh Goyal

When your infrastructure starts making decisions on its own ‚Äî is that innovation or a nightmare? Let's find out.

Hall A, 14:30 - 15:30. <https://cloudconf.ai|üéüÔ∏è Register>

üõ†Ô∏è *Workshop Alert: "From Zero to MCP: Building Kubernetes AI Integrations"*

Instructors: Matas Kaminskas & Narunas Kapocius

Board Room | 11:30 - 13:00 (90 min hands-on)

Bring your laptop. Leave with a working MCP integration. The best kind of conference ROI.

March 14. <https://cloudconf.ai|üéüÔ∏è Register>

‚ò∏Ô∏è *Don't miss: "How BigBasket Uses Kubernetes to Handle Unpredictable Traffic Surges While Optimizing Cost"*

Sushant Gulati, Senior Engineering Manager at BigBasket, shares real production K8s patterns at massive scale.

If you've ever panic-scaled your cluster during a sale event, this one's for you.

Hall A, 11:30. <https://cloudconf.ai|üéüÔ∏è Register>

üê≥ *Speaker Announcement: Ajeet Singh Raina*

_"The Rise of the Augmented Developer: How AI Agents Are Creating a New Breed of 10x Engineers"_

Docker Developer Advocate, Collabnix founder, and Distinguished Arm Ambassador.

"The most valuable developers in 2026 aren't those who type the fastest, but those who direct AI most effectively."

Hall B, 16:00. <https://cloudconf.ai|üéüÔ∏è Register>

üîê *Speaker Announcement: Rahul Jadhav*

_"The Illusion of Safety with Prompt-Based Guardrails in LLMs"_

Co-founder & CTO at AccuKnox (Zero-Trust K8s Runtime Security).

Your prompt guardrails? They might be an illusion. Come find out why.

Hall A, 14:00. <https://cloudconf.ai|üéüÔ∏è Register>

üí∞ *GPU costs keeping you up at night?*

_"From Idle to Invisible: Eliminating GPU Waste with Kubernetes-Native Scale-to-Zero"_

Abhishek Choudhary & Shubham Rai on how to stop burning money on idle GPUs.

Hall C, 12:30. This talk pays for itself.

<https://cloudconf.ai|üéüÔ∏è Register>
